## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G06040](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G06040)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>bL12my</u>
- **Gene Name:** Ribosomal Protein bL12my
- **Description:**   Ribosomal protein L12/ ATP-dependent Clp protease adaptor protein ClpS family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2080369
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
